title: What's new in v2.59.0
content:
Features:
• Batch content paste to all selected cels
• Copy visible option

Enhancements:
• Anti-aliasing option for the text tool
• 'Do not show again' option for layer/frame removal confirmation
• Indexed mode blur tool to use RGB value proximity instead of raw index value
• Default palettes can be deleted
• Onion skin to respect tags with a toggle to ignore them in settings
• Option to disable the isometric guide line's vertical lines
• Other UI improvements

Fixes:
• Stop showing export size warning for .aseprite export
• Animation scrub to respect frame navigation looping setting
• Attempted to fix the file deletion button sometimes does not work
